article_title: Recap: At least 22 killed in strike on Gaza school.
sentence: But  here's  a  quick  recap  of  what  else  we've  been  reporting  on  in  the  Middle  East  today:  In  Gaza:    At  least  22  people  have  been  killed  and  dozens  wounded  in  an  Israeli  air  strike  on  a  school  building  in  northern  Gaza,  according  to  Gaza's  Hamas-run  Civil  Defence  Agency.
